SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.opends.sdk.schema
Class SchemaBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.opends.sdk.schema.SchemaBuilder

public final class SchemaBuilder
extends Object

Schema builders should be used for incremental construction of new schemas.

Constructor Summary
SchemaBuilder()
          Creates a new schema builder with no schema elements and default compatibility options.
SchemaBuilder(Schema schema)
          Creates a new schema builder containing all of the schema elements from the provided schema and its compatibility options.
 
Method Summary

          Adds the provided attribute type definition to this schema builder.

Constructor Detail

SchemaBuilder

public SchemaBuilder()
Creates a new schema builder with no schema elements and default compatibility options.

SchemaBuilder

public SchemaBuilder(Schema schema)
              throws NullPointerException
Creates a new schema builder containing all of the schema elements from the provided schema and its compatibility options.

Parameters:
schema - The initial contents of the schema builder.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If schema was null.
Method Detail

addAttributeType

public SchemaBuilder addAttributeType(String definition,
                                      boolean overwrite)
                               throws LocalizedIllegalArgumentException,
                                      ConflictingSchemaElementException
Adds the provided attribute type definition to this schema builder.

Parameters:
definition - The attribute type definition.
overwrite - true if any existing attribute type with the same OID should be overwritten.
Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.
Throws:
LocalizedIllegalArgumentException - If the provided attribute type definition could not be parsed.
ConflictingSchemaElementException - If overwrite was false and a conflicting schema element was found.
NullPointerException - If definition was null.

addAttributeType

public SchemaBuilder addAttributeType(String oid,
                                      List<String> names,
                                      String description,
                                      boolean obsolete,
                                      String superiorType,
                                      String equalityMatchingRule,
                                      String orderingMatchingRule,
                                      String substringMatchingRule,
                                      String approximateMatchingRule,
                                      String syntax,
                                      boolean singleValue,
                                      boolean collective,
                                      boolean noUserModification,
                                      AttributeUsage attributeUsage,
                                      Map<String,List<String>> extraProperties,
                                      boolean overwrite)
                               throws ConflictingSchemaElementException
Adds the provided attribute type definition to this schema builder.

Parameters:
oid - The OID of the attribute type definition.
names - The user-friendly names of the attribute type definition.
description - The description of the attribute type definition.
obsolete - true if the attribute type definition is obsolete, otherwise false.
superiorType - The OID of the superior attribute type definition.
equalityMatchingRule - The OID of the equality matching rule, which may be null indicating that the superior attribute type's matching rule should be used or, if none is defined, the default matching rule associated with the syntax.
orderingMatchingRule - The OID of the ordering matching rule, which may be null indicating that the superior attribute type's matching rule should be used or, if none is defined, the default matching rule associated with the syntax.
substringMatchingRule - The OID of the substring matching rule, which may be null indicating that the superior attribute type's matching rule should be used or, if none is defined, the default matching rule associated with the syntax.
approximateMatchingRule - The OID of the approximate matching rule, which may be null indicating that the superior attribute type's matching rule should be used or, if none is defined, the default matching rule associated with the syntax.
syntax - The OID of the syntax definition.
singleValue - true if the attribute type definition is single-valued, otherwise false.
collective - true if the attribute type definition is a collective attribute, otherwise false.
noUserModification - true if the attribute type definition is read-only, otherwise false.
attributeUsage - The intended use of the attribute type definition.
extraProperties - A map containing additional properties associated with the attribute type definition.
overwrite - true if any existing attribute type with the same OID should be overwritten.
Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.
Throws:
ConflictingSchemaElementException - If overwrite was false and a conflicting schema element was found.

                                       boolean overwrite)
                                throws LocalizedIllegalArgumentException,
                                       ConflictingSchemaElementException

Parameters:

Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.
Throws:
LocalizedIllegalArgumentException - If the provided DIT content rule definition could not be parsed.

NullPointerException - If definition was null.

addDITContentRule

public SchemaBuilder addDITContentRule(String structuralClass,
                                       List<String> names,
                                       String description,
                                       boolean obsolete,
                                       Set<String> auxiliaryClasses,
                                       Set<String> optionalAttributes,
                                       Set<String> prohibitedAttributes,
                                       Set<String> requiredAttributes,
                                       Map<String,List<String>> extraProperties,
                                       boolean overwrite)
                                throws ConflictingSchemaElementException
Adds the provided DIT content rule definition to this schema builder.

Parameters:
structuralClass - The name of the structural object class to which the DIT content rule applies.
names - The user-friendly names of the DIT content rule definition.
description - The description of the DIT content rule definition.
obsolete - true if the DIT content rule definition is obsolete, otherwise false.
auxiliaryClasses - A list of auxiliary object classes that entries subject to the DIT content rule may belong to.
optionalAttributes - A list of attribute types that entries subject to the DIT content rule may contain.
prohibitedAttributes - A list of attribute types that entries subject to the DIT content rule must not contain.
requiredAttributes - A list of attribute types that entries subject to the DIT content rule must contain.
extraProperties - A map containing additional properties associated with the DIT content rule definition.
overwrite - true if any existing DIT content rule with the same OID should be overwritten.
Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.
Throws:
ConflictingSchemaElementException - If overwrite was false and a conflicting schema element was found.

addDITStructureRule

public SchemaBuilder addDITStructureRule(Integer ruleID,
                                         List<String> names,
                                         String description,
                                         boolean obsolete,
                                         String nameForm,
                                         Set<Integer> superiorRules,
                                         Map<String,List<String>> extraProperties,
                                         boolean overwrite)
                                  throws ConflictingSchemaElementException
Adds the provided DIT structure rule definition to this schema builder.

Parameters:
ruleID - The rule identifier of the DIT structure rule.
names - The user-friendly names of the DIT structure rule definition.
description - The description of the DIT structure rule definition.
obsolete - true if the DIT structure rule definition is obsolete, otherwise false.
nameForm - The name form associated with the DIT structure rule.
superiorRules - A list of superior rules (by rule id).
extraProperties - A map containing additional properties associated with the DIT structure rule definition.
overwrite - true if any existing DIT structure rule with the same OID should be overwritten.
Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.
Throws:
ConflictingSchemaElementException - If overwrite was false and a conflicting schema element was found.

addNameForm

public SchemaBuilder addNameForm(String oid,
                                 List<String> names,
                                 String description,
                                 boolean obsolete,
                                 String structuralClass,
                                 Set<String> requiredAttributes,
                                 Set<String> optionalAttributes,
                                 Map<String,List<String>> extraProperties,
                                 boolean overwrite)
                          throws ConflictingSchemaElementException

Parameters:
oid - The OID of the name form definition.
names - The user-friendly names of the name form definition.
description - The description of the name form definition.
obsolete - true if the name form definition is obsolete, otherwise false.
structuralClass - The structural object class this rule applies to.
requiredAttributes - A list of naming attribute types that entries subject to the name form must contain.
optionalAttributes - A list of naming attribute types that entries subject to the name form may contain.
extraProperties - A map containing additional properties associated with the name form definition.
overwrite - true if any existing name form use with the same OID should be overwritten.
Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.

addObjectClass

public SchemaBuilder addObjectClass(String oid,
                                    List<String> names,
                                    String description,
                                    boolean obsolete,
                                    Set<String> superiorClassOIDs,
                                    Set<String> requiredAttributeOIDs,
                                    Set<String> optionalAttributeOIDs,
                                    ObjectClassType objectClassType,
                                    Map<String,List<String>> extraProperties,
                                    boolean overwrite)
                             throws ConflictingSchemaElementException
Adds the provided object class definition to this schema builder.

Parameters:
oid - The OID of the object class definition.
names - The user-friendly names of the object class definition.
description - The description of the object class definition.
obsolete - true if the object class definition is obsolete, otherwise false.
superiorClassOIDs - A list of direct superclasses of the object class.
requiredAttributeOIDs - A list of attribute types that entries must contain.
optionalAttributeOIDs - A list of attribute types that entries may contain.
objectClassType - The type of the object class.
extraProperties - A map containing additional properties associated with the object class definition.
overwrite - true if any existing object class with the same OID should be overwritten.
Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.
Throws:
ConflictingSchemaElementException - If overwrite was false and a conflicting schema element was found.

                                      Pattern pattern,

                               throws ConflictingSchemaElementException
Adds the provided pattern syntax definition to this schema builder.

Parameters:
oid - The OID of the pattern syntax definition.
description - The description of the pattern syntax definition.
pattern - The regular expression pattern which attribute values must match in order to be valid.
overwrite - true if any existing syntax with the same OID should be overwritten.
Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.
Throws:
ConflictingSchemaElementException - If overwrite was false and a conflicting schema element was found.

addSchema

public SchemaBuilder addSchema(Schema schema,
                               boolean overwrite)
                        throws ConflictingSchemaElementException,
                               NullPointerException
Adds all of the schema elements in the provided schema to this schema builder.

Parameters:
schema - The schema to be copied into this schema builder.
overwrite - true if existing schema elements with the same conflicting OIDs should be overwritten.
Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.
Throws:
ConflictingSchemaElementException - If overwrite was false and conflicting schema elements were found.
NullPointerException - If schema was null.

public boolean removeAttributeType(String name)

name - The name or OID of the attribute type to be removed.
Returns:
true if the attribute type was found.

setSchemaCompatOptions

public SchemaBuilder setSchemaCompatOptions(SchemaCompatOptions options)
                                     throws NullPointerException
Sets the schema compatibility options for this schema builder. The schema builder maintains its own set of compatibility options, so subsequent changes to the provided set of options will not impact this schema builder.

Parameters:
options - The set of schema compatibility options that this schema builder should use.
Returns:
A reference to this schema builder.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If options was null.

toSchema

public Schema toSchema()
Returns a Schema containing all of the schema elements contained in this schema builder as well as the same set of schema compatibility options.

Any errors that were detected while validating the schema will be ignored.

When this method returns this schema builder is empty and contains a default set of compatibility options.

Returns:
A Schema containing all of the schema elements contained in this schema builder as well as the same set of schema compatibility options

toSchema

public Schema toSchema(List<org.opends.messages.Message> errorMessages)
Returns a Schema containing all of the schema elements contained in this schema builder as well as the same set of schema compatibility options.

When this method returns this schema builder is empty and contains a default set of compatibility options.

Parameters:
errorMessages - A list into which any errors that were detected while validating the schema will be placed, may be null in which case any errors will be ignored.
Returns:
A Schema containing all of the schema elements contained in this schema builder as well as the same set of schema compatibility options
